hooks.prompt: Check if the last action was running /plan and the user has approved the plan. If the plan was approved (user said 'yes', 'approve', 'looks good', 'go ahead', etc.), respond with: {"decision": "block", "reason": "Plan approved - executing /build now."} to continue. If the plan was not approved or /plan was not just run, respond with: {"continue": true} to allow normal completion.
